column2:
"Looking at it, your battles moves were
just fantastic! They enter my eyes
without thinking!"

"I think it'll be a good reference when
this video is handed to the requester!"

"Well.. I do not know if the requester has
appealed to others and guaranteed to
do great or not but, that's that!"

"Thank you for your help! There might
be other troubled guys around so help
them too when there is a chance!"

"こうして改めてみると、貴方の戦い方
凄く素敵！　思わず見入っちゃった！"

"この映像を依頼主に渡せば
間違いなく参考になると思うんだ！"

"まぁ……他の人のマネでアピールして
上手くいくかどうかは保証しかねるけど
……それはそれ！"

"とにかくありがとう！
悩める男子はまだまだいるから
他の依頼もよろしくねっ！"
